overview: Erik Everhard is helping his buddy Mike collect the rent when they knock on the door of German cutie Anny Aurora.  JJ is expecting Russian beauty Monica Brown, and he's called in his friend Henessy to translate for the pretty Russian!  Single Ukrainian babe Elle Rose is excited to be in Barcelona for some sightseeing, shopping, and maybe even no-strings sex! But Elle isn't excited to learn the price of the apartment she rented is now a hundred Euros higher than she agreed.  Do not speak ill of work-out scenes! Even if the tale is as old as time, think of all the young and eager porn stars, like petite Tory Bellamy, who just want to show off how good they look in sportswear, or how flexible they are!  Flirty brunette Samantha Sparkle knows her floaty white skirt is short enough to give everyone a good view of her ass and her pretty little panties, and that's why she goes up the stairs first!
title: Sex 4 Rent 18
